segments.text: After you've thought it over , get back to me and we can go ahead .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Miao Ping , if I do decide to go ahead , how will the interest if I exceed be counted ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is higher than the rate of interest for Current Deposits and a little lower than the rate for the 6 - month time deposits .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , if I do decide to go ahead , how can my company open a Corporate Agreement Savings Plan with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First of all , you need to sign a Corporate Agreement Savings Contract with us . This means we can go ahead and open an account of agreement savings based on your settlement account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , let's get the ball rolling on this .
segments.speaker: S2
